## R Markdown

```{r}
# install.packages("arules")

library(arules)
data <- read.csv("AppleStore.csv", head = TRUE)
data_clean <- na.omit(data)

# Removing uneccessary columns
data_clean$id <- NULL
data_clean$ver <- NULL
data_clean$vpp_lic <- NULL
data_clean$game_enab <- NULL

# Transaction data? used for apriori
tdata <- read.transactions("AppleStore.csv", sep=",")
tdata_clean <- na.omit(tdata)

```

## HCLUST

```{r}
distance = dist(as.matrix(data_clean), method = "euclidean")

# perform clustering
hc = hclust(distance)

# cut the tree
clusterCut <- cutree(hc, 10)

# plot dendrogram
plot(clusterCut)
```

## Apriori

```{r}
apprules <- apriori(tdata_clean, parameter = list(support = 0.002, confidence = 0.25, minlen = 2, maxlen=10))

summary(apprules)
inspect(sort(apprules, by = "support")[1:5])

# itemFrequencyPlot(tdata_clean, support = 0.1)
```
